documents.title: Employee SOP Overview
documents.content: Cloudora SOPs define step-by-step workflows that employees must follow. Genie uses these SOPs to give real-time instructions, corrections, and best practices.

documents.title: Telecalling SOP
documents.content: 1) Greet professionally. 2) Confirm name & requirement. 3) Ask structured questions. 4) Collect full details. 5) Add CRM notes. 6) Send info on WhatsApp if needed. 7) Schedule follow-up. 8) Update CRM status immediately.

documents.title: Sales SOP
documents.content: 1) Identify requirement. 2) Align service correctly. 3) Pitch value, not price. 4) Explain deliverables clearly. 5) Handle objections politely. 6) Share proposal. 7) Follow-up in structured timeline. 8) Update CRM.

documents.title: CRM SOP
documents.content: 1) Update status after every call. 2) Write clear notes. 3) Add follow-up date. 4) Complete daily pending tasks. 5) Maintain accuracy. 6) Avoid blank or unclear updates. Genie checks CRM discipline.

documents.title: Support SOP
documents.content: 1) Understand issue. 2) Classify severity. 3) Acknowledge client. 4) Provide ETA. 5) Troubleshoot step-by-step. 6) Escalate if required. 7) Close ticket properly. 8) Update notes.

documents.title: Development SOP
documents.content: 1) Understand task clearly. 2) Create sub-tasks. 3) Write clean code. 4) Test properly. 5) Commit with good messages. 6) Push via branch. 7) Deploy using workflow. 8) Update ticket.

documents.title: Administration SOP
documents.content: 1) Maintain documents. 2) Verify employee credentials. 3) Update tools access. 4) Maintain daily logs. 5) Support employees with HR/operations queries. 6) Ensure efficiency.
